name: icsr-causality-assessment-tool
description: An AI-powered chat bot that acts as a world-class drug safety physician to provide causality assessments for Individual Case Safety Reports (ICSR).

scripts.build: mkdir public && cp -r components services index.html index.tsx App.tsx types.ts metadata.json public/ && echo "window.API_KEY='${API_KEY}';" > public/api-key.js
